exceptions.tactic: intros L f1 f2 f3 f4 T H1 H2 H3.

ctx: intros L' f1 f2 f3 f4 T H1 H2 H3.
exceptions.exn: In environment L : Language Formula := fol.Formula L : Set Formulas := fol.Formulas L : Set System := fol.System L : Type Term := fol.Term L : Set Terms := fol.Terms L : nat -> Set var := fol.var L : nat -> fol.Term L apply := fol.apply L : forall f : Functions L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f)) -> fol.Term L equal := fol.equal L : fol.Term L -> fol.Term L -> fol.Formula L atomic := fol.atomic L : forall r : Relations L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r)) -> fol.Formula L impH := fol.impH L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L notH := fol.notH L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L forallH := fol.forallH L : nat -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L orH := fol.orH L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L andH := fol.andH L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L existH := fol.existH L : nat -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L iffH := fol.iffH L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L ifThenElseH := fol.ifThenElseH L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L SysPrf := folProof.SysPrf L : fol.System L -> fol.Formula L -> Prop L', f1, f2, f3, f4, T : Formula H1 : System H2 : SysPrf H1 (iffH L' f3) H3 : SysPrf H1 (iffH f1 f4) Unable to unify "fol.notH L f3" with "f4".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Your Response:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

Your Response:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
L: Language
Formula: Set
Formulas: Set
System: Type
Term: Set
Terms: nat -> Set
var: nat -> fol.Term L
apply: forall f : Functions L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f)) -> fol.Term L
equal: fol.Term L -> fol.Term L -> fol.Formula L
atomic: forall r : Relations L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r)) -> fol.Formula L
impH: fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L
notH: fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L
forallH: nat -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L
orH: fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L
andH: fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L
existH: nat -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L
iffH: fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L
ifThenElseH: fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L
SysPrf: fol.System L -> fol.Formula L -> Prop

Goal:
forall (f1 f2 f3 f4 f5 f6 : Formula) (T : System), SysPrf T (iffH f1 f4) -> SysPrf T (iffH f2 f5) -> SysPrf T (iffH f3 f6) -> SysPrf T (iffH (ifThenElseH f1 f2 f3) (ifThenElseH f4 f5 f6))

Premises:
Relations = fun l : Language => let (Relations, Functions, _) := l in Relations : Language -> Set
arity : forall l : Language, Relations l + Functions l -> nat
inr : ?B -> ?A + ?B where ?A : [L : Language Formula := fol.Formula L : Set Formulas := fol.Formulas L : Set System := fol.System L : Type Term := fol.Term L : Set Terms := fol.Terms L : nat -> Set var := fol.var L : nat -> fol.Term L apply := fol.apply L : forall f : Functions L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f)) -> fol.Term L equal := fol.equal L : fol.Term L -> fol.Term L -> fol.Formula L atomic := fol.atomic L : forall r : Relations L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r)) -> fol.Formula L impH := fol.impH L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L notH := fol.not
Trying to mask the absolute name "Terms"! [masking-absolute-name,deprecated]
inl : ?A -> ?A + ?B where ?A : [L : Language Formula := fol.Formula L : Set Formulas := fol.Formulas L : Set System := fol.System L : Type Term := fol.Term L : Set Terms := fol.Terms L : nat -> Set var := fol.var L : nat -> fol.Term L apply := fol.apply L : forall f : Functions L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f)) -> fol.Term L equal := fol.equal L : fol.Term L -> fol.Term L -> fol.Formula L atomic := fol.atomic L : forall r : Relations L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r)) -> fol.Formula L impH := fol.impH L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L notH := fol.not
Functions = fun l : Language => let (Relations, Functions, _) := l in Functions : Language -> Set
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
reduceIff : forall (f1 f2 f3 f4 : Formula) (T : System), SysPrf T (iffH f1 f3) -> SysPrf T (iffH f2 f4) -> SysPrf T (iffH (iffH f1 f2) (iffH f3 f4))
reduceOr : forall (f1 f2 f3 f4 : Formula) (T : System), SysPrf T (iffH f1 f3) -> SysPrf T (iffH f2 f4) -> SysPrf T (iffH (orH f1 f2) (orH f3 f4))
reduceAnd : forall (f1 f2 f3 f4 : Formula) (T : System), SysPrf T (iffH f1 f3) -> SysPrf T (iffH f2 f4) -> SysPrf T (iffH (andH f1 f2) (andH f3 f4))
reduceImp : forall (f1 f2 f3 f4 : Formula) (T : System), SysPrf T (iffH f1 f3) -> SysPrf T (iffH f2 f4) -> SysPrf T (iffH (impH f1 f2) (impH f3 f4))
reduceExist : forall (f1 f2 : Formula) (v : nat) (T : System), ~ In_freeVarSys L v T -> SysPrf T (iffH f1 f2) -> SysPrf T (iffH (existH v f1) (existH v f2))
reduceForall : forall (f1 f2 : Formula) (v : nat) (T : System), ~ In_freeVarSys L v T -> SysPrf T (iffH f1 f2) -> SysPrf T (iffH (forallH v f1) (forallH v f2))
Formula_rec : forall (L : Language) (P : fol.Formula L -> Set), (forall t t0 : fol.Term L, P (fol.equal L t t0)) -> (forall (r : Relations L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r))), P (fol.atomic L r t)) -> (forall f1 : fol.Formula L, P f1 -> forall f2 : fol.Formula L, P f2 -> P (fol.impH L f1 f2)) -> (forall f2 : fol.Formula L, P f2 -> P (fol.notH L f2)) -> (forall (n : nat) (f3 : fol.Formula L), P f3 -> P (fol.forallH L n f3)) -> forall f4 : fol.Formula L, P f4
Formula_rect : forall (L : Language) (P : fol.Formula L -> Type), (forall t t0 : fol.Term L, P (fol.equal L t t0)) -> (forall (r : Relations L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r))), P (fol.atomic L r t)) -> (forall f1 : fol.Formula L, P f1 -> forall f2 : fol.Formula L, P f2 -> P (fol.impH L f1 f2)) -> (forall f2 : fol.Formula L, P f2 -> P (fol.notH L f2)) -> (forall (n : nat) (f3 : fol.Formula L), P f3 -> P (fol.forallH L n f3)) -> forall f4 : fol.Formula L, P f4
Formula_sind : forall (L : Language) (P : fol.Formula L -> SProp), (forall t t0 : fol.Term L, P (fol.equal L t t0)) -> (forall (r : Relations L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r))), P (fol.atomic L r t)) -> (forall f1 : fol.Formula L, P f1 -> forall f2 : fol.Formula L, P f2 -> P (fol.impH L f1 f2)) -> (forall f2 : fol.Formula L, P f2 -> P (fol.notH L f2)) -> (forall (n : nat) (f3 : fol.Formula L), P f3 -> P (fol.forallH L n f3)) -> forall f4 : fol.Formula L, P f4
Formula_ind : forall (L : Language) (P : fol.Formula L -> Prop), (forall t t0 : fol.Term L, P (fol.equal L t t0)) -> (forall (r : Relations L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r))), P (fol.atomic L r t)) -> (forall f1 : fol.Formula L, P f1 -> forall f2 : fol.Formula L, P f2 -> P (fol.impH L f1 f2)) -> (forall f2 : fol.Formula L, P f2 -> P (fol.notH L f2)) -> (forall (n : nat) (f3 : fol.Formula L), P f3 -> P (fol.forallH L n f3)) -> forall f4 : fol.Formula L, P f4
left : ?A -> {?A} + {?B} where ?A : [L : Language Formula := fol.Formula L : Set Formulas := fol.Formulas L : Set System := fol.System L : Type Term := fol.Term L : Set Terms := fol.Terms L : nat -> Set var := fol.var L : nat -> fol.Term L apply := fol.apply L : forall f : Functions L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f)) -> fol.Term L equal := fol.equal L : fol.Term L -> fol.Term L -> fol.Formula L atomic := fol.atomic L : forall r : Relations L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r)) -> fol.Formula L impH := fol.impH L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L notH := fol.notH L : fol.Formula L ->...-> Prop |- Prop]
fst : ?A * ?B -> ?A where ?A : [L : Language Formula := fol.Formula L : Set Formulas := fol.Formulas L : Set System := fol.System L : Type Term := fol.Term L : Set Terms := fol.Terms L : nat -> Set var := fol.var L : nat -> fol.Term L apply := fol.apply L : forall f : Functions L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f)) -> fol.Term L equal := fol.equal L : fol.Term L -> fol.Term L -> fol.Formula L atomic := fol.atomic L : forall r : Relations L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r)) -> fol.Formula L impH := fol.impH L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L notH := fol.notH L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L forallH := fol.forallH L : nat ->...-> Prop |- Type]

Inductive Formula (L : Language) : Set := equal : fol.Term L -> fol.Term L -> fol.Formula L | atomic : forall r : Relations L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r)) -> fol.Formula L | impH : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L | notH : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L | forallH : nat -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L Arguments fol.forallH _ _%nat_scope
Formula_depth_ind2 : forall (L : Language) (P : fol.Formula L -> Prop), (forall t t0 : fol.Term L, P (fol.equal L t t0)) -> (forall (r : Relations L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r))), P (fol.atomic L r t)) -> (forall f : fol.Formula L, P f -> forall f0 : fol.Formula L, P f0 -> P (fol.impH L f f0)) -> (forall f : fol.Formula L, P f -> P (fol.notH L f)) -> (forall (v : nat) (a : fol.Formula L), (forall b : fol.Formula L, lt_depth L b (fol.forallH L v a) -> P b) -> P (fol.forallH L v a)) -> forall f4 : fol.Formula L, P f4
Term_Terms_rec : forall (L : Language) (P : Set) (P0 : nat -> Set), (nat -> P) -> (forall f0 : Functions L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f0)) -> P0 (arity L (inr f0)) -> P) -> P0 0 -> (forall n : nat, fol.Term L -> P -> fol.Terms L n -> P0 n -> P0 (S n)) -> fol.Term L -> P
